fish.description: Dark fresh-water trout with light spots.

wood.description: Bits of branches and bark gathered from the forest floor.

worm.description: Wriggling earthworms gathered from the soil.

ore.description: A glob of orange brown metal with flecks of green.

caviar.description: Dark circular eggs with a distinctly fishy and salty smell.

stonefish.description: A horrid-looking fish that is certainly poisonous.

eel.description: A snakelike fish that pulses electricity.

stone block.description: A shaped rock that would be good for toolmaking.

hammer.description: A simple tool formed from a stone wedged between a forked stick.

flatworm.description: A flat invertebrate that feeds and breathes by diffusion.

fire.description: A small flame from wood gathered in the forest.

wormwood.description: A bitter yet aromatic shrub with possibly medicinal properties.

cocoon.description: A lemon-shaped worm incubator that is the size of your pinky thumb-nail.

treasure chest.description: A jewel-encrusted box perfect for holding small trinkets.

amulet.description: A golden necklace with possibly magical powers.

copper.description: A refined piece of malleable and conductive metal.
